C

canDefenderProtectKingFromEnemy(ArrayList<ChessPiece>, ArrayList<Point>) - Method in class ChessBoard
This function is used when the king is in checkmate, check if there is any pieces can get rid of the enemy piece that cause the check of the king, otherwise the player need to move the king or it's already checkmate
canKingCastle(ChessPiece) - Method in class ChessBoard
Since there are many restriction of castling, for example if it's the first move of king or is there anything between king and rook this function is used to check the availability of king castling.
canMoveMax(char) - Method in class ChessBoard
this part is check the maximum move of the piece, since the rook, bishop and queen can move all the way to the edge of the chessboard
canStillPlay - Static variable in class ChessBoard
 
captured() - Method in class ChessPiece
captured is called when a chess piece is removed from the board
check - Static variable in class ChessBoard
 
checkmate - Static variable in class ChessBoard

continueAfterBlockingPiece - Static variable in class ChessBoard
 
convertBoardIndexToString(int, int) - Method in class ChessBoard
Following three functions are used to convert from player-friendly chessboard location of the chess piece to the 2D-array index that friendly to programmer and the other way around
convertChessLocationToBoardIndex(String) - Static method in class Chess
This function is same as the one in ChessBoard.java, used for convert player friendly chessboard location to programmer friendly 2d-array index
